title: Sri Lanka women's national basketball team
text:
The Sri Lankan women's national basketball team is the <a href="basketball">basketball</a> team representing <a href="Sri%20Lanka">Sri Lanka</a> in international competitions.
It is administered by the <a href="Sri%20Lanka%20Basketball%20Federation">Sri Lanka Basketball Federation</a> (SLBF).
Current roster.
Roster for the <a href="2017%20FIBA%20Women%27s%20Asia%20Cup">2017 FIBA Women's Asia Cup</a>.
